QuestData.Title: The Missing Blastgineer
QuestData.Description: It looks like you might not be completely useless after all. Perhaps you can handle something a little more important.$B$BAbout two days ago I sent Blastgineer Fuzzwhistle to Windshear Mine. He was supposed to get there, make sure everything was going according to plan with the bomb, and report back. Two days and nothin'...$B$BHead out to the woods south of here and find him. For his sake, he better be dead.
